long_description: Toss in towels, snacks and water bottles and you're off to the beach. Bring it empty to the farmers market and mound it high with local bounty. The Haiku Day Tote is your fun do-it-all haul bag. Roomy tote hauls everything you need in style. 3 interior elastic-trimmed slip-in pockets help keep bottles upright and stow small items. 3 exterior zippered pockets (1 hidden) separate and help protect electronics, wallet, etc. Tote-style carry handles have a padded wrap for comfort. Haiku Day Tote is made from recycled material.
short_description: Toss in towels, snacks and water bottles and you're off to the beach. Bring it empty to the farmers market and mound it high with local bounty. The Haiku Day Tote is your fun do-it-all haul bag.
